title: We handle the business, you create the story.
description-1:
Brightside Media Group consists of four specialist firms that strengthen one another.

Media Partners offers strategic and operational expertise: from budget control and legal advice, to establishing clear production structures and providing production management.

Flanders Tax Shelter connects Belgian companies with Flemish productions through a fully transparent and closely involved process. Investors benefit from a legal tax advantage and additional remuneration, while every euro remains traceable and every investment makes an impact.
description-2:
Brightside Productions realizes projects in the audiovisual and performing arts sectors. We assemble creative teams, manage cash flow, and ensure that the production is on a sound business footing.

Famework is an online matching platform for content makers and brands. We guide marketeers, agencies and content makers in their search for product placement and relevant partnerships.

We are not generalists, but specialists with a deep understanding of the media sector. Thanks to the combined expertise of these enterprises, every phase of a project runs clearly, transparently and efficiently - allowing makers to focus fully on what they do best: creating.
